TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 定義自訂工作階段狀態識別項管理員必須實作的合約。

span.span: Defines the contract that a custom session-state identifier manager must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面識別的方法，您必須實作以建立工作階段識別碼值的自訂管理員。The interface identifies the methods that you must implement to create a custom manager for session-identifier values. 介面實作會建立，然後驗證工作階段識別碼值，並管理從 HTTP 要求的 HTTP 回應中的工作階段識別碼的儲存體，以及擷取工作階段識別碼值。An interface implementation creates and validates session-identifier values, and manages the storage of a session identifier in the HTTP response as well as the retrieval of a session-identifier value from the HTTP request. 啟用使用自訂的工作階段識別碼管理員`sessionIDManagerType`屬性[工作階段狀態項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)組態項目。You enable the custom session-ID manager using the `sessionIDManagerType` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) configuration element. 如果您介面實作會支援無 cookie 工作階段識別項，您必須實作解決方案來傳送和擷取 URL，例如 ISAPI 篩選器中的工作階段識別項。If your interface implementation will support cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. 如果您只想要提供自訂的工作階段識別碼值，以供 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態，您可以建立繼承的類別類別並覆寫只和具有自己的自訂實作的方法。If you only want to supply custom session-identifier values to be used by ASP.NET session state, you can create a class that inherits the class and override only the and methods with your own custom implementation. 這可讓您提供您自己的工作階段識別碼值，同時依賴基底類別來儲存對 HTTP 回應的值，並擷取 HTTP 要求的值。This enables you to supply your own session-identifier values, while relying on the base class to store values to the HTTP response and retrieve values from the HTTP request. 如需覆寫類別並實作這些方法，請參閱提供的範例方法類別。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示管理員實作以 cookie 為基礎的工作階段 ID 的類別。The following code example shows a class that implements a cookie-based session-ID manager. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#1)]

Public Function CreateSessionID (context As HttpContext) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateSessionID(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context);

param.name: context
param.span: 目前的 物件，參考用於處理 HTTP 要求 (例如， 和 屬性) 的伺服器物件。

span.span: The current object that references server objects used to process HTTP requests (for example, the and properties).

summary.span: 建立唯一工作階段識別項。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來產生唯一的工作階段識別項，物件會使用來識別新的工作階段。The method is used to generate a unique session identifier that the object will use to identify a new session. 所傳回的值必須是唯一的且必須包含可以儲存在 HTTP 回應和要求的有效字元。The value returned by must be unique and must contain valid characters that can be stored in an HTTP response and request. 如果可能的話，所傳回的值您實作包含在 HTTP 回應或要求中無效的字元，您應該使用編碼中的工作階段識別碼值的方法您方法實作和方法來解碼的工作階段識別碼值，在您方法實作。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法。The following code example implements the method. 此方法會建立新来做為工作階段識別項。The method creates a new to be used as a session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#3)]

summary.span: 從目前 HTTP 要求的內容中，取得工作階段識別項。

span.span: Gets the session identifier from the context of the current HTTP request.

returns.span: 與 HTTP 要求一起傳送的目前工作階段識別項。

span.span: The current session identifier sent with the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫期間和事件。The method is called by the during the and events. 如果您無法從 HTTP 要求來擷取有效的工作階段識別碼，傳回`null`。If you cannot retrieve a valid session identifier from the HTTP request, return `null`. 如果接收`null`從方法，它會呼叫方法來取得新的工作階段識別項，為新的工作階段。If the receives `null` from the method, it will call the method to get a new session identifier for a new session. 如果可能的話，所傳回的值您實作包含在 HTTP 回應或要求中無效的字元，您應該使用編碼中的工作階段識別碼值的方法您方法實作和方法來解碼的工作階段識別碼值，在您方法實作。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範部分實作方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果您自訂的工作階段識別碼的管理員支援無 cookie 工作階段識別項，您必須實作解決方案來傳送和擷取 URL，例如 ISAPI 篩選器中的工作階段識別項。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool InitializeRequest (System.Web.HttpContext context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, out bool supportSessionIDReissue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool InitializeRequest(class System.Web.HttpContext context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, [out] bool& supportSessionIDReissue) cil managed
Public Function InitializeRequest (context As HttpContext, suppressAutoDetectRedirect As Boolean, ByRef supportSessionIDReissue As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool InitializeRequest(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % supportSessionIDReissue);

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，包含目前要求的相關資訊。

span.span: The object that contains information about the current request.

param.name: suppressAutoDetectRedirect
param.span: 如果工作階段 ID 管理員應該重新導向以判斷 Cookie 支援，則為 ，否則為 ，表示抑制自動重新導向以判斷 Cookie 支援。

span.span: if the session-ID manager should redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, to suppress automatic redirection to determine cookie support.

param.name: supportSessionIDReissue
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，其中包含在原始 ID 過期時，會指出 物件是否支援發出新工作階段 ID 的布林值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean that indicates whether the object supports issuing new session IDs when the original ID is out of date.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.span: 當在 URL 上編碼工作階段狀態 ID 時，及出現共用 URL 或以電子郵件傳送 URL 的可能性時，則適合重複使用工作階段 ID。

span.span: Session ID reuse is appropriate when the session-state ID is encoded on a URL and the potential exists for the URL to be shared or emailed.

param.span: 如果自訂工作階段狀態實作依虛擬路徑分割 Cookie，則應該同樣支援工作階段狀態。

span.span: If a custom session-state implementation partitions cookies by virtual path, session state should also be supported.

summary.span: 執行 物件的按要求初始化程序。

span.span: Performs per-request initialization of the object.

returns.span: 表示初始化執行了重新導向，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that the initialization performed a redirect; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法針對由處理每個要求呼叫物件。The method is called for each request handled by the object. 使用方法來初始化每個要求資料物件。Use the method to initialize per-request data for the object. 當`suppressAutoDetectRedirect`參數是`true`、物件不應該使用重新導向來判斷瀏覽器是否支援 cookie。When the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `true`, the object should not use redirection to determine whether the browser supports cookies. `supportSessionIDReissue`應傳回參數`false`如果 cookie 用於工作階段識別; 否則傳回`true`如果您實作支援重新發行的工作階段識別碼。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter should be returned `false` if cookies are used for session identification; otherwise, return `true` if your implementation supports re-issuing session IDs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法期間事件中的工作階段識別項中移除如果新的工作階段已建立但未使用的集合。The calls the method during the event to remove the session identifier from the collection if a new session was created but was not used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法。The following code example implements the method. The session identifier.

summary.span: 將新建立的工作階段識別項儲存至 HTTP 回應。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫物件期間事件。The method is called by the object during the event. 方法會在 URL （使用無 cookie 工作階段狀態） 時或是不會過期的工作階段 cookie 中儲存的工作階段識別碼。The method stores the session identifier either in the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 如果可能的話，從傳回的值您實作包含在 HTTP 回應或要求中無效的字元，您應該使用編碼中的工作階段識別碼值的方法您方法實作和方法來解碼的工作階段識別碼值，在您方法實作。If it is possible that the value returned from your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範部分實作方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果您自訂的工作階段識別碼的管理員支援無 cookie 工作階段識別項，您必須實作解決方案來傳送和擷取 URL，例如 ISAPI 篩選器中的工作階段識別項。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會確認提供`id`是有效的工作階段識別碼。The method verifies that the supplied `id` is a valid session identifier. 您實作應該呼叫方法從方法時從 HTTP 要求，以便確認已正確格式化提供工作階段識別碼擷取工作階段識別項。Your implementation should call the method from the method when retrieving a session identifier from an HTTP request to ensure that the supplied session identifier is properly formatted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法，並確認工作階段識別碼值是否有效。The following code example implements the method and ensures the session-identifier value is a valid . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#6)]
